# Clinical Data {#sec-clinical-data}

Chapter Overview: Comprehensive clinical data collection across the surgical care continuum.

Pre-operative Data Collection

Patient history and risk factor assessment
Clinical examination findings
Diagnostic test results integration
Anaesthetic risk stratification


Intra-operative Documentation

Surgical procedure coding (MBS alignment)
Operative technique and approach documentation

Immediate post-operative assessment
Complication surveillance and reporting
Discharge planning and coordination
Long-term follow-up scheduling
